messages: e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:35): hello, will you be my dungeon master?
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:35): you invent made up scenarios, for me to make choices in
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:35): then you determine the outcomes
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:35): and we keep going, so on and so forth
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:35): okay... where am i?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:36): Umm In an abandoned castle
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:36): what do i see around me?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:36): um...a lot of big doors
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:36): two pairs of staircases
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:36): cobwebs
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:37): i'd like to try opening one of the big doors
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:37): You enter the banquet hall
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:37): On your right you see many windows
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:38): and on your left there is 2 more doors
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:38): i walk over to the windows, to try to peer outside
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:38): you see fields and a moat around the castle
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:39): does the moat look dangerous?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:39): not from were you are
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:39): but it looks pretty murky
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:39): okay, i walk back over to the doors and try one of the handles
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:39): it comes of in your hand
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:40): can i keep the doorknob?
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:40): okay, i put it in my pocket. what do i see when i look through the knob hole?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:40): a light to the left
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:41): small though
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:41): i try forcing the door open
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:41): it dosnt budge
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:41): sigh, i try the remaining door in the banquet hall
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:42): it opens and the light is blinding
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:42): i shield my eyes and try to make out some details
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:43): Theres a brighter light towards the ceiling
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:43): and there is a hole in the middle of the room
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:43): i walk towards the hole with caution
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:44): The stone cracks a bit
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:44): i kneel down and try to look in the hole
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:45): you see bars and skeleton looks like a dungeon
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:45): okay i proceed into the dungeon
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:46): um.....the skeleton looks like its been theyre for a long time...
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:46): You can hear rats and mice crawling around
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:46): any sign of other travelers?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:47): Not there...but you hear queit footsteps
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:47): i move towards the footsteps, with caution
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:48): they suddenly stop
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:48): i throw the doorknob i kept in a random direction as a diversion
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:49): (what time are we in??)
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:49): (does not matter, whever you want to saY)
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:49): (future, past, current)
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:49): You hear gunshots
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:50): i instantly drop to the ground and cover my head, and try to see what is going on
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:50): you see two figures and they speak in a rapid launguage
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:51): do the figures appear friendly?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:51): Not really
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:51): i try to sneak closer to make out more details
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:52): without being noticed
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:52): if possible
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:52): youre not noticed but they start walking away
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:52): i attempt to trail them
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:52): to see where they go
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:53): you follow them to a smalll boat that looks like it travels outside using the moat
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:53): i attempt to hop onto the boat without being noticed
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:54): you hop on and become a castaway there seem to be another 20 men onboard
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:55): are there any supplies that i can try to steal?
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:55): or weapons?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:55): theres a few ropes lying around and a small pistol on a barrel but you hear voices
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:56): i try to get a visual on the voices
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:57): they seem to be coming from behind you to your left
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:57): okay, i attempt to pickup the gun
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:57): i run for it
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:57): you get the gun but if you jump off youll land in the moat
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:58): okay, do i have the gun? was i noticed?
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:59): you have the gun but you are kind of noticed but they dont know what you are yet
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (11:59): okay, i try to conceal the weapon. i also try to appear friendly / harmless
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (11:59): it works and they ignore you
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (12:00): okay, now that i know they are not a threat i start walking around the boat trying to get an idea of where we are going
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (12:00): they try to speak to you
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (12:00): can i understand their language?
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (12:01): i try to appear preoccupied, i walk the other direction
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (12:02): they start walking towards you and trying out other languages
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (12:02): they appear to be smart
e5432705bbdc2cd62e8ca9b3b7815e34 (12:02): okay, i try saying "do you understand me?" in my native tounge
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (12:02): they understand
897352e1128d2ccf2f147cef32fcf598 (12:03): And ask you in your native toungue what you are doing
